SEARCH
Package it.sose.rest.weather.service

Interface WeatherTracker

All Known Implementing Classes:
WeatherTrackerImpl
public interface WeatherTracker
Interface for tracking and retrieving daily weather-related values. Implementations must handle storage, retrieval, and formatting of the data.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    addWeatherTracker(int a)
    Records a new weather value for the current day.
    String
    last7DaysValues()
    Retrieves the recorded weather values for the past 7 days (excluding today).
    String
    printWeatherTracker()
    Returns a formatted string representing all stored weather values for each day of the year, organized by month and day.

  • Method Details

    • printWeatherTracker

      String printWeatherTracker()
      Returns a formatted string representing all stored weather values for each day of the year, organized by month and day.
      Returns:
      a human-readable table of recorded weather values

    • addWeatherTracker

      String addWeatherTracker(int a)
      Records a new weather value for the current day.
      Parameters:
      a - the weather value to record for today
      Returns:
      a confirmation message or an error message if input is invalid

    • last7DaysValues

      String last7DaysValues()
      Retrieves the recorded weather values for the past 7 days (excluding today).
      Returns:
      a string representation (e.g. array format) of the last 7 days' values
